content:
Currently on https://live.lean-lang.org:

/elan/toolchains/leanprover--lean4---v4.2.0-rc4/bin/lake print-paths Init failed:

stderr:
error: missing manifest; use lake update to generate one

Can anyone else reproduce?

(Also, did I just access the site at a bad time/during maintenance of some sort, or is this actually an issue?)
Git failed during the latest mathlib update and there was no retry logic
Thomas Murrills has marked this topic as resolved.
